name: Quizality
description: Quizality - Gamers Edition is a single player multiple choice quiz, set in a Virtual Reality land. Bursting with videogame trivia, that covers all generations of gaming.
minimum_requirements: OS: 64-Bit Windows 7, 8, 10 Processor: Quad Core Processor Memory: 8000 MB RAM Graphics: GeForce GTX 970 or AMD Radeon R9 290 or better DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 1000 MB available space
